name: 周素鳳
objective:
The course in this semester is designed to reinforce students' competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.
The whole class will be divided into 10 groups with 4-5 students in each group.  Every week, 4 groups will be well-prepared for an assigned unit.  In addition, every student will be arranged to take TWO individual oral tests. You will be asked questions related to the unit.  Every week, two groups of students will be assigned to take the oral test.  One of the groups will take the test in class and one will be given after class.
